location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Sir Lewis Pelly, Athanaeum Club, Pall Mall, London to Lord Lytton (Edward Bulwer-Lytton, 2nd Baron Lytton)

mods.abstract: Letter encosing a copy of a telegram (no longer enclosed) and informing his Lordship that he is available to return to work at a day's notice should there be any suitable duty for him.The date of the letter is difficult to read, but may be 3 October 1878.
